Those Two Geeks Episode Thirty Five: We Get Excited About Captain Marvel. Start your Sunday with some geeky listening. #captainmarvel, #podcast

On the docket this week: Absolutely no plans (again), but we do talk movies. As always, the Alex and Joe can be found on twitter respectively @karcossa and @jc_hesh if you feel the need to tell them they’re wrong individually, or @those2geeks if you want to yell at them together on twitter, or by email at ItsThose2Geeks@gmail.com.

summary: During New York Toy Fair 2019, Mattel has released official images for the Shazam! basic action figures and DC Multiverse action...
body:
During New York Toy Fair 2019, Mattel has released official images for the Shazam! basic action figures and DC Multiverse action figure releases. Be warned that SPOILERS are ahead for the film in terms of which characters are present. However, seeing as these figures have already started appearing at Wal-Mart stores across the US, the spoilers have been out there for the last week or so.

Shazam! Basic Figures

Each figure includes one of the Seven Deadly Enemies of Man, but one is missing and might be included with a later figure. The figures include:

  • Shazam!
  • Freddy
  • Mary
  • Darla
  • Pedro
  • Eugene

Shazam! DC Multiverse Figures

Two figures based on the Shazam! film are a part of the DC Multiverse line aimed at collectors. Oddly enough, this wave only contains Shazam! and Dr. Sivanna and no Collect-and-Connect figure as well as no Freddy, Mary, Darla, Pedro, or Eugene.

That does it for the Shazam! figures shown as part of NYTF 2019. Mattel will be hosting a presentation later on during the show and we should hear more of their other lines at that time.

What do you think of these figures? If you like what you see, you might be able to get them at your local Wal-Mart today. Let us know in the comments and on social media your thoughts and stay tuned for more New York Toy Fair 2019 coverage right here on Hero Club!

Source: ToyArk

NYTF 2019: #Shazam! Action Figure Reveals *SPOILERS*

blog.name: thebookofrust
blog.title: The Book of Rust
blog.description: Learning. Designing. Growing.This is my design (blog).

summary: One of the things I’m super looking forward to this year is the Captain Marvel movie, which is why I decided to try and make a...
body: One of the things I’m super looking forward to this year is the Captain Marvel movie, which is why I decided to try and make a logo based on her own. It was interesting because it let me practice a bunch of functions we’d learned in class but also forced me to get creative in certain parts because I’m still a novice. In any case, I had a blast playing the shapes and the colours.

reblog.comment: One of the things I’m super looking forward to this year is the Captain Marvel movie, which is why I decided to try and make a logo based on her own. It was interesting because it let me practice a bunch of functions we’d learned in class but also forced me to get creative in certain parts because I’m still a novice. In any case, I had a blast playing the shapes and the colours.

In any case, I had a blast playing the shapes and the colours.
